Package game.action

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AttackAction
    An Action to allow an actor ( attacker ) to reduce the hitpoints of another actor ( target )
    AttackSurroundingAction
    An Action to allow the actor to perform a surrounding attack on other Actors within the area.
    ChoiceInput
    A class to accept and verify input.
    DeathAction
    An action executed if an actor is killed.
    DespawnAction
    An action to despawn the actor.
    NearMe
    A utilities class to get the surroundings of an actor
    PurchaseAction
    A class to allow the trader to give purchase actions to the player
    QuickStepAction
    An Action to attack another Actor and then choose a random location to relocate to
    ResetAction
    A reset action is an action that performs full reset of the game Created by: Yeoh Ming Wei
    RestAction
    A rest action is an action that performs partial reset of the game Created by: Yeoh Ming Wei
    SellAction
    An Action to allow the player to sell the weapon to trader
    SummonAction
    A summon action is an action that allows player to summon an Ally.
    TradeItemAction
    An Action to allow swapping of item/weaponItem for another item/weaponItem Note: currently does not allow trading of item for item because cannot overload constructor due to error called, same erasure
    UnsheatheAction
    An Action to double the damage to the target
